New Records: Suryakumar Yadav and Shivam Dube shared a half-century stand to help India break the stranglehold
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma were dismissed by Saurabh Netravalkar in the powerplay
Rishabh Pant was castled by Ali Khan
Suryakumar Yadav and Shivam Dube shared a half-century stand to help India break the stranglehold
Arshdeep Singh took a career-best 4-9 to hobble USA
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma called correctly and asked USA to bat in seaming conditions
India had a motley crew with day jobs against cricketing royalty
Post-Match Reflections: Suryakumar Yadav and Shivam Dube's half-century stand proved to be a game-changer for India
India are now through to the Super Eights, but USA are still very much masters of their own fate
Miscellaneous Highlights: The conditions and personnel affected USA's performance
Arshdeep Singh's career-best performance was a turning point in the match
Suryakumar Yadav's reprieve deflated USA and gave India a chance to recover
